column4: tough I use the drivers from the Nvidia homepage and I use Sourcemage on my Desktop computer
I only use Ubuntu on my laptop at the moment, and not sure if i continue using it, if i don't get the friggin Fn key to work
have you tried setting up keyboard shortcuts?

I have setup the Multimediakeys and the volume keys, those where easy because they created an ordinary event, i used "dmesg" to see what event and then assigned the key a keycode. But Fn and Fn+something doesn't create any event visible in dmesg
a Compaq N610c, newest firmware ("new" being relative, the last BIOS is from 2004)
no, I looked into it, but didn't find much
because it's a reconfiguration where he can fix things
as long as it doesn't ASK him where his mouse's node is...
